title: search box
content:
a long search box showed up on top of my screen, and when i type in the middle search box the words goes to the top search box. how do i get rid of this top search box? i uninstalled firefox, worried it is a malware. i refresh and reinstalled firefox a few days ago, it did not help. 

    can somebody  remove that  search box if i install firefox again?

title: "Malware (the application), unwanted feature
content: Just updated My "MALWARE" the Anti-malware software application. It asked me if I wanted to enable some software artificial intelligence see everything know everything help with everything feature I clicked learn more then could not go back to question page. I DO NOT WANT TO grant such permission, I have looked thru "Malware's" settings and cannot find it. Iit starts, I believe, with the letters "Ge" and is one word, (Gestation?...dont know). Firefox was supposed to have a problem with it and warn me but I rebooted and Firefox said nothing. How do I find this feature in "malware the app" and disable-kill it? I never authorized it but I did not have a chance to say no eithersay no either. Signed: Freaked out

title: firefox snap 89.0, to play video, you need to install the required video codecs
content:
On ubuntu 20.04, the snap version of firefox can't play some videos. Some youtube videos will play but streams won't, and then I get the message "to play video, you need to install the required video codecs". On telegram web and tweetdeck I also get this message while trying to play some video.

Since it's a snap, nothing I do on my system will solve the problem, I cannot install any codecs.

It's firefox 89.0
creator: lucaszanella

title: New Firefox format is visually vague and confusing
content: I hate the New Firefox- especially blending the tabs into invisibly divisions- maybe this is someone's idea of streamlined- but Firefox' s problem is in retaining the previous more structured look. The previous look was easier to see at a glance and navigate.
creator: bobcatbowen
